entry.title: Litecoin v0.8.3.7 audit report
entry.summary: Peter Todd, a Bitcoin developer, shared an audit report of Litecoin v0.8.3.7, which he thought might be of interest to Bitcoin. The files can be accessed through zip archive or individual links provided by Peter Todd. The audit report includes a report.txt.asc file with a SHA256 hash of 24832b4b8411f3fbcc98b96bdfaaf90f4aeac39a7fbfb491bff5a76d23859dbd, a 40809aed-1b5cb086.diff file, and a litecoin-0.8.3.x-code-audit-agreement.txt.asc file.
